abstract: Pinger, a developer of mobile applications, can get twice as much in sales from programs for Apple devices than for phones powered by Android software. That’s not stopping it from creating its first Android app, Bloomberg News reported.
snippet: Pinger, a developer of mobile applications, can get twice as much in sales from programs for Apple devices than for phones powered by Android software. That’s not stopping it from creating its first Android app, Bloomberg News reported.
lead_paragraph: Pinger, a developer of mobile applications, can get twice as much in sales from programs for Apple devices than for phones powered by Android software. That’s not stopping it from creating its first Android app, Bloomberg News reported.

abstract: Apple’s entry into social media has created bumps in its relationship with Facebook.
snippet: Apple’s entry into social media has created bumps in its relationship with Facebook.
lead_paragraph: Update 9:05 p.m. Added Facebook’s Developer Principles
